text: Ford Ranger is a North American pickup truck distributed via Ford Motor Company. The Ranger currently in operation dates back to around 1983, although the name Ranger first got used on other types of Ford trucks in 1965. The Ford Ranger was discontinued in 2011, though it will be brought back in 2019. ==References== Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Ranger
title: Ford Ranger
